Package DAO

Class CustomerDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.CustomerDB

extends java.lang.Object
    This class operates CRUD for customers in the application.

      • getAllCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
        This method gets All customers. The method grabs customers from observable list.
        Returns:
        Returns observable customer list.

      • selectAllCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> selectAllCustomers()
        This method selects all Customers. The method selects all customers from the Database to be used in the application.
        Returns:
        Returns observable customerList.

      • nextID

        public static java.lang.Integer nextID()
        This method grabs next Customer Id. The method grabs the next available customer ID from the DB.
        Returns:
        customer ID

      • updateCustomer

        public static java.lang.Integer updateCustomer​(java.lang.Integer customerID,
                                               java.lang.String customerName,
                                               java.lang.String address,
                                               java.lang.String postalCode,
                                               java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                               int divisionID)
        This method updates the customer DB. The method updates the customer DB and adds the customer to customer list to be used by the application.
        Parameters:
        customerID - Customer ID
        address - Customer address
        customerName - Customer's name
        divisionID - Division integer
        phoneNumber - Customer phone number
        postalCode - Customers zip code
        Returns:
        Returns customer ID

      • addCustomer

        public static void addCustomer​(java.lang.String customerName,
                               java.lang.String customerAddress,
                               java.lang.String customerPostal,
                               java.lang.String customerPhone,
                               int divisionID)
        This method adds a Customer to the DB. The method adds a customer to the Database and adding customer to customer list.
        Parameters:
        divisionID - Division ID
        customerName - Customer's name
        customerAddress - Customer's Address
        customerPhone - Customer's phone number
        customerPostal - Customer's zip code

      • deleteCustomer

        public static boolean deleteCustomer​(java.lang.Integer customerID)
        This method is a boolean for deleting a customer from the DB. The method, if true will delete the customer from the DB, if it's false it will not.
        Parameters:
        customerID - Customer's ID
        Returns:
        Returns either true or false

      • getID
